alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cuyahoga and northern Summit Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Royalton, or 11 miles southwest of Cleveland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parma, Strongsville, North Royalton, Solon, Hudson, Twinsburg, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, Highland Hills, Garfield Heights, Maple Heights, Parma Heights, Broadview Heights, Brook Park, Middleburg Heights, Brecksville, Bedford, Seven Hills, Bedford Heights and Independence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
